nodes.text: Cirus II was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories that was a mining world for syntonium. Lex was a mine operator there.

The cargo hauler pilot Tem Chesko had visited Cirus II for his syntonium haul. He was later stranded in space after an asteroid collided with his ship, destroying his hyperdrive and comlink. He calculated 10 parsecs to the nearest planet, which would be 32.6 light-years, and he would not arrive at anything in under sixty years.
